title: Datalad get not working with on a specific network
body:
#### What is the problem?
I'm trying to install and download this dataset: https://github.com/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds001545

As an example, trying to get this file `datalad get sub-01/func/sub-01_task-movie_run-01_bold.nii.gz`
and doing a `datalad install`

I've gotten the following errors:

datalad 0.10.2
```
Total (0 ok, 1 failed out of 1):   0%|                                                                                 | 0.00/280M [00:00<?, ?B/s][WARNING] Running get resulted in stderr output:   Remote is configured to use versioning, but no S3 version ID is recorded for this key
git-annex: get: 1 failed
 
[ERROR  ] from s3-PUBLIC...; Unable to access these remotes: s3-PUBLIC; Try making some of these repositories available:;       41c48007-5636-4d32-bf50-a372ccc28c77 -- root@db67d735f607:/datalad/ds001545;  	67152e11-096c-4d56-a362-05ff2daa5775 -- [s3-PUBLIC];  	df4b8ac1-b5b1-4ea1-b7ae-a3696ba696a0 -- s3-PRIVATE; ; (Note that these git remotes have annex-ignore set: origin) [get(/home/zorro/datasets/ds001545/sub-01/func/sub-01_task-movie_run-01_bold.nii.gz)] 
get(error): /home/zorro/datasets/ds001545/sub-01/func/sub-01_task-movie_run-01_bold.nii.gz (file) [from s3-PUBLIC...; Unable to access these remotes: s3-PUBLIC; Try making some of these repositories available:; 	41c48007-5636-4d32-bf50-a372ccc28c77 -- root@db67d735f607:/datalad/ds001545;  	67152e11-096c-4d56-a362-05ff2daa5775 -- [s3-PUBLIC];  	df4b8ac1-b5b1-4ea1-b7ae-a3696ba696a0 -- s3-PRIVATE; ; (Note that these git remotes have annex-ignore set: origin)]
```
and
datalad 0.11.0
```
[WARNING] Running get resulted in stderr output:   Set both AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID and AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY to use S3
git-annex: get: 1 failed
 
[ERROR  ] from s3-PUBLIC...; Unable to access these remotes: s3-PUBLIC; Try making some of these repositories available:; 	41c48007-5636-4d32-bf50-a372ccc28c77 -- root@db67d735f607:/datalad/ds001545;  	67152e11-096c-4d56-a362-05ff2daa5775 -- [s3-PUBLIC];  	df4b8ac1-b5b1-4ea1-b7ae-a3696ba696a0 -- s3-PRIVATE; ; (Note that these git remotes have annex-ignore set: origin) [get(/home/alejandro/datasets/raw/ds001545/sub-01/func/sub-01_task-movie_run-01_bold.nii.gz)] 
get(error): /home/alejandro/datasets/raw/ds001545/sub-01/func/sub-01_task-movie_run-01_bold.nii.gz (file) [from s3-PUBLIC...; Unable to access these remotes: s3-PUBLIC; Try making some of these repositories available:; 	41c48007-5636-4d32-bf50-a372ccc28c77 -- root@db67d735f607:/datalad/ds001545;  	67152e11-096c-4d56-a362-05ff2daa5775 -- [s3-PUBLIC];  	df4b8ac1-b5b1-4ea1-b7ae-a3696ba696a0 -- s3-PRIVATE; ; (Note that these git remotes have annex-ignore set: origin)]
```

#### What steps will reproduce the problem?
I'm having a hard time diagnosing this, as at first I thought it was a datalad version, but I tried two versions. Very oddly though, this problem only seems to occur on the UT network (not at home), and I've had no issues with other OpenNeuro datasets. 

Will try again when I'm home with upgraded datalad to see if problem persists. 

Also, side question: is there a way to get datalad 0.11.0 on Ubuntu 18.10?
